comment.author: 97828344@N00
comment._content:
"There is not in the wide world
A valley so sweet
As that vale in whose bosom
The bright waters meet"

- Thomas Moore


Is it any wonder that Irish emigrants become maudlin and sentimental about their homeland when they have images and poetry like this haunting their consciousnesses?

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: Meeting of the Waters, Avoca, Co. Wicklow (Lawrence Collection) - catalogue.nli.ie/Record/vtls000326163
